name: Project A (IMPULSE SLY)
description:
This game is an action based multiplayer first person shooter developed in Godot. This game uses fictional representations of real world guns with arcade style movement to provide a fast paced action shooter. You will be jumping around with low gravity, sliding under obstacles and running along walls to out manoeuvre your opponents in this upcoming release by SLY Studio's. The first playable version is a prototype of the character controller that is still in development along with a grey box test level to understand the basic mechanics of the game. For as little as $1 you can help support me in my game making journey, you do not need to spend a cent to get access to the game however.

Stay up to date on this page and follow along with the devlogs to see exactly what is happening with Project A and to see what changes have been made. Multiplayer tests will be announced through devlogs so make sure to follow them to see when multiplayer is being tested and to try it out with the Project A community.

We hope to see you on the battleground.

Development of Project A started on the 19th of January 2022.

Project A is available on both Windows and Linux

Update Schedule:

Every day I plan on uploading one new update to Project A to itch.io along with a devlog post,  this means if you check this page every day you will see all the updates and progress of Project A slowly coming along.  Every devlog will tell you what to expect from tomorrows update.

How to support me and my game development journey:

If you wish to support me and my journey to becoming a full time indie game developer please consider purchasing Project A for $1, it would greatly help out with development and will help keep updates coming.

Project A is the Working Title.
